website_summaries.verdict: About the same price as other models, but it includes plentiful chime options and two receivers. It's the smart choice unless it's likely to be directly exposed to rain.
pros: Simple installation, loud volume, and dizzying collection of 50 chimes to choose from
Users like flexibility of getting two receivers
cons: Chimes were distorted on the highest volume levels, and it was frustrating to press the tunes button 50 times to cycle through the options

website_summaries.verdict: This is a great option for anyone that is looking for the convenience of a wireless doorbell and needs more than 1 receiver.
pros: Comes  with 50 different tones to choose from
Sounds to a wide range to ensure that it is heard, even if at a distance
Comes with 2 receivers that both plug directly into the wall
cons: Receiver plugs are 3-pronged, so they cannot be rotated in an outlet

customer_reviews.title: I have NO idea why all the 5-Star reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I just found out today that this thing only works some of the time from TWO different people (One a delivery guy). There is another review here saying the same thing. When it comes to a doorbell, I cannot accept that. I went out to test it, and the ringer button itself needs to be pressed exactly right. It's cheap plastic as usual so it looks like it just became frail with a few dozen or so pushes over the months (a lot of deliveries because of moving). And because of this, it will obviously only become worse and less reliable. To me, this is not acceptable. A doorbell needs to work 100% of the time. You have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great when it works.  Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: On my second set. This is great set up for our house, but both sets died within six months of purchasing. We replaced the batteries both times and they don't work. Need to find a similar product as this one has not worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Dobbie

customer_reviews.title: It works and it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and the chimes are loud. I like the variety of choices. No volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Eveya

customer_reviews.title: Push Button Rarely Works
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mid 2017, before 2018 rolled around it had stopped working. The batteries are still working, but the push button rarely works! Only works if you push hard and on the right side, which of course is impossible to let every delivery person know. We've had tons of people ring the doorbell and walk away because they thought we weren't home since it doesn't register that anyone pushed the button. Only remembered to come write a review because I was shopping for a new doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: StephS

customer_reviews.title: Less than a year
customer_reviews.text: When we first got this doorbell, we were pretty excited about it. We live in a pretty large apartment and it is hard to hear when someone knocks on the door. We used a velcro command strip and hooked it up. The doorbell does not get a lot of use but nice to have and lots of sound choices, including some for Christmas but less than a year later and the doorbell no longer works. We thought it was the battery but noticed people were still knocking so we check it again and the doorbell has just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: "J"

customer_reviews.title: Not worse $5
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in July 30, 2018. I loved it when it came in. Loved the way it looked and the fact that it had two transmitters, so that we could hear the door bell no matter where we were. Well a little over the 30 days, it stop working for no reason. Of course lost the timeframe to return the merchandise. Very upset. I removed my working old door that I had for 10 year, for a new look and now I need to go out and buy a new one. I DONT recommend this to anyone. I should have known better, to cheap to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Brync5

customer_reviews.title: Non-existent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Failed after two years; tried repeatedly to contact customer service -- nada, totally does not exist. Awful company and waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Defective Transmitter / Reviews for free accessory
customer_reviews.text: Wanted it to work but transmitter button defective. Even removed cover to test directly and did get a few presses to work enough to test it briefly then no button presses worked. Also a few things to note to clarify things I read prior to purchasing and actual. 1000’ range in description refers to “open air” range while manual says 600’ range. Programming a new ringtone requires going through a learning mode - 1) Cycle through and select a ringtone 2) Press the volume button for 5 seconds unti it chirps and flashes 3) Press the transmitter button within 5 seconds to accept and pair. Some of these reviews were done in return to receive a free accessory from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Ben C

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive offer
customer_reviews.text: Let me be clear, I like the unit. What I am unhappy about is that they (Sadotech) included a FREE offer of a battery, extra button or some stickers. I left a review as instructed but when I went to get my FREE item the only thing that was not "out of stock" was some crappy stickers. I wanted an extra button and feel that I was misled. I can't see how the manufacturer of the units are out of stock of the unit. Scam. Too bad it seems like a nice unit but I would never buy from them again. Honesty counts for a lot and I did not find it here.
customer_reviews.author: Chickenman40

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this as it is simple and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this as it is simple and cheap. Unfortunately this product won't ring both receivers most of the times, sometimes it won't even ring at all. I even placed the receivers with 10 feet of the transmitter but no help. Returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year and customer support is horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: These doorbells seem great at first, however mine stopped working. I contacted support, and went through the motions about how to sync the transmitter and receivers. I explained to them what I was doing, that I've also done it before, to no avail. after weeks of going back and forth, they then asked me to video myself trying to sync the devices. I'm sorry, but that's an unreasonable request and the price of these is not worth the hours i've already spent wasted with their support. I'll be purchasing a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Idratherbeskiing

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works, but not after 17 months. Edit - Great support, they back their products!
customer_reviews.text: Button / transmitter stopped working. No physical damage, and the battery was fine. The button doesn't lit up anymore and not making the receiver rings. It should be water proof, if the water damage was the reason why. Edit - I changed the rating to 5 stars, because they back their products. So, it could be one out of thousands the product did not function 100% but they do back their product even after a year. I contacted the seller, but I believed that they won't do anything since it has been more than a year since my purchase. After a few email exchanges, they sent me a replacement. That was great! So, now I have confidence to buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Yee

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof or just weatherproof?
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I really love this product. The variety of sounds, the range, and the ease of installation far surpass any other wireless doorbell I know. What is confusing, however, is that the description calls it weatherproof and waterproof, but the manufacturer's instructions just say weatherproof. Since mine had to be installed with full exposure to the elements, I added one thing: before reinstalling the cover I placed a sheet of plastic wrap over the circuit board and battery, then snapped the cover on and trimmed the excess plastic wrap. I'm hoping this will make it much more water-resistant. I deducted one star for the contradictory information .
customer_reviews.author: MacGuyver

customer_reviews.title: Not weather resistant
customer_reviews.text: My grandma is hard of hearing and this is great with 2 receivers she hears it without her hearing aids in. Update. After about 2 months of use the door bell went off nonstop last night. The remote is not waterproof and was fried. It is under an alcove but with the high winds it got a little wet. This product worked well up until now. Why would anyone design a doorbell that isn't waterproof?
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: 100% Fail Rate for 2 Sets
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets of these. Both failed in a little over 1 year or so. Contacted their support and was told warranty is 12 months. I am out of luck. Fail rate is 100%. Will be going with a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple Installation
customer_reviews.text: Set up was simple and quick---out of the box and installed in about 15 minutes. Since it was just installed I have no idea what the longevity of the battery will be but so far so good. Receivers are small and easily hidden if that is your goal. I really like the variety of chimes although some of the tunes are a bit annoying. Still, its nice to have a choice. I like the seasonal chimes. My biggest concerns are the transmitter battery life and the weather resistant quality of the transmitter. I may have to revisit this review in the future. I'm sure the battery will last longer than the coin style battery in my old wireless doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: Pull the trigger on this nearly perfect simple doorbell!
customer_reviews.text: The doorbell is a cinch to set up. I love that you can have multiple receivers connected to the same transmitter so you can have one in a different section of the home and still hear it. I also love that there so many options of what chime sound you get. Lastly, I love that the receivers plug directly into the wall so you only have to deal with the one small inexpensive battery with the transmitter. The only thing that would make it better is if the receiver was slightly redesigned to sit lower on the outlet, most things won’t be allowed to plug in at the same time in a standard outlet without using some type of splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Matt E

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 and receivers died in about a year.
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect longevity from these things. I have purchased 3 so far and in no time, one or more of the receivers have died completely (plug in, press the set-up buttons and nothing happens). Very disappointed because they worked so well in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: Relatively small size receiver that plugs into any outlet
customer_reviews.text: This was a neat product because it comes with two receivers for two different locations in the house and they are relatively small so when you plug into an outlet, it does not cover all the plate. The door bell remote ringer is larger than typical doorbell buttons but I think it would be easy to spot by visitors or delivery guys. I did not play with the different melodies and kept the default chyme. I like that you can adjust the volume. Seems to be loud enough on lowest setting. Recommended especially that it is a great value for three items that came ready to plug and go.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Ghareeb

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a while but September will be two years and the battery is already dead with minimal use. It says three years, so it’s got a half life, sure. Ordered new batteries, hoping this will fix my problem but based off other reviews the unit may be bad so while this is convenient, it’s cheaper to just hardwire a real doorbell once then have to buy batteries every year.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Festim

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed! Wireless doorbell, the transmitter button uses a battery (comes with one) and the two receivers plug into outlets. There are I believe 52 different sounds you can choose from, and 4 volume levels. The packaging says it retains your selection even being unplugged so you don't have to go through it all again if you lose power or move it. The product is good looking, very clean, simple and modern looking. The lights on the receivers flash when the doorbell rings so this would work for hearing impaired.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie St Jean

customer_reviews.title: very good bell.
customer_reviews.text: It a nice bell with two chimes. You can plug them in any electrical outlet so the whole house can hear the bell. No electrical fitting is required. You can buy the battery for the button any where. Battery is easy to change. Bell looks very cool. We left the old one in too. But everyone rings the new bell . Overall its a very good product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Opinion helps

customer_reviews.title: Compact size yet powerful, REPURPOSED for Emergency use.
customer_reviews.text: I only have positive things to say about the features of this wireless doorbell: I installed and replaced your Wireless Doorbell with a Ring Doorbell, BUT, I had an emergency afterwards. I was in my attic without my mobile phone, my access ladder came up and I could not push it back down. luckily my wife was home, but couldn't hear me to pull the ladder back down. She finally checked on me and helped me by pulling the ladder back down. I have since installed the Sado doorbell button up in the attic and I can summon her if it ever happens again. I don't always carry my mobile phone. The signal transmission is great, covers my entire home.
customer_reviews.author: R. Balboa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wireless Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I had problems with my previous wireless doorbell because of the distance between the button and the chime. The Sado Tech wireless doorbell solved that problem. It was very simple to install. I placed one chime in our great room and one in our master bedroom. We can hear it ring all over the house. I love all the ring tones and my wife is looking forward to the holidays where we change the ringtone to Christmas ringtones. It's an awesome wireless doorbell and I highly recommend for anyone who is looking for some simple to install and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Porter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to add on
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one doorbell and two receivers. I programmed the receivers with different tunes just for fun. I decided to add a doorbell when I saw one advertised as waterproof. I programmed the receivers to play a different tune for each doorbell. Now I know if someone is at the front or back door. The waterproof doorbell has been rained on, and it still works. If I didn't have to scroll through each tune, I would probably change the tunes more often. If I did that, though, I might have a hard time remembering which tune goes with which door; so I'll keep my five-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: First class quality, unbelievable price, and guarantee total satisfaction.
customer_reviews.text: My experience with SadoTech Wireless Doorbell is they GUARANTEE customers' TOTAL SATISFACTION. When I first received the new set, I immediately tried it, found only one Doorbell Receiver was responding to the Transmitter, the button. I emailed the company, got replied within 4 hours, and offered the way of fixing. Tried immediately, failed again then emailed back. The 2nd day, I received a call from their technical support agent, and fixed the problem within 5 minutes. Very happy to pay serious attention to customers's request. Also the quality of the product is truly FIRST CLASS, and the price is UNBELIEVABLE. High recommendation to other potential customers.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Teng

customer_reviews.title: One Unit failed after 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Nov 2018 and Loved it. But in June (still under warranty) one of the receivers failed. I contacted SadoTech and initially they were quick to respond. However, once I gave them the info they asked for - communication stopped. I am STILL WAITING. All I want is a replacement. VERY DISAPOINTING. UPDATE: I did finally receive a replacement receiver- it works but I cannot program the desired ring. Every time I set it - it reverts to a different ring. At least it rings.
customer_reviews.author: Debby O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Quality products that’s easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We were without a doorbell for years. Short of hiring an electrician we tried everything to fix it. Tired of the please knock sign I decided to give this a try. It went on quickly and easily. The ringer inside the house had plenty of volume and a wide range on ringers to choose from including holiday tunes. We have a covered porch so it doesn’t get directly wet on our home so I can’t speak to weather it is waterproof. Ordered a second “ringer” for upstairs to extend the sound throughout our house. Very nice doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Cheer Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peezy Works great
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4/5 stars because the bell button attaches with tape and we had an issue where it fell on the first night and rang our bell at 2 am. A bit scared with that and the thought of someone at the door at that time. It reattached with no problem and has been stable and working with no issue for several months. The 2 receivers provide more coverage for a multi-story residence than traditional hard wired doorbell. I bought this to supplement a secondary door when we had to divert all power to install a Ring.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J.

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup, install, use and configure
customer_reviews.text: I have a house where there are 2 floors and a large outdoor area. I have three ringers setup one on each floor and one outside. That way we can hear the door bell from where ever we are in the house. This work great. If I had anything I would change it would be the volume available, I would like it to be able to be louder. Hard to hear the doorbell when a bunch of kids are playing loudly. That said, it's a good deal, take 10 minutes to setup and install and most of that time is spent figuring out which doorbell sound you want.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Installation is easy and it has a number of good ringtones for doorbells. My only small gripe is the changing of the ringtones. You have to hit the doorbell and the receiver at the same time to save the change. Not a problem when you setting it up for the first time, but if you want to change it to a christmas theme for the holidays, then you have to either have two people hit them both or unplug it and move it closer to the doorbell so you can hit both within a 3-5 second span. Slightly annoying. Also, some ringtones are louder than others, even with the volume control. Other than that, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Coyote Kid

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: We've only been using this 5 months, & it suddenly went crazy the last rain storm, chiming & lighting up non-stop until we disconnected it. We let it dry out a couple days, then tried again.... silence. Went out & bought new batteries. Nothing. Shouldn't a doorbell last YEARS? 😢
customer_reviews.author: Lora Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Certainly works in a pinch!
customer_reviews.text: My Sky-bell suddenly quit on me. I needed something quick and easy. This fit the bill for a temporary fix. The only unexpected disappointment was no light on the door bell that mounts next to the dark. If it's dark and the porch light is not on, you can not see the button. Since I ordered black it's even more invisible. It lights up once you press the button just no constant light; maybe that feature would run the battery down too quickly. (You can not use the adhesive mounting option on any type of textured surface as it will fall away after 8-10 hours.)
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: A lot of variety, easy to set up, achieves it's purpose, sound quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: Though I wish they sounded a little higher quality than they do, they are more than loud enough and have quite a variety of tones. It's easy to set up and I haven't encountered any issues with disconnects or lack of rings. Both ring bases ring at the exact same time and the ringer itself looks simple and easy to identify which is what I needed for the outside. Had the sound quality of the ring tone itself been a bit higher end, I would have given it 5 stars but the actually sound quality isn't that great outside of how loud it is and the variety of rings.
customer_reviews.author: Keithian

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Strong signal...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our small rural hospital since having to keep all doors locked due to COVID-19 for screening patients prior to entering. One was placed outside the ER doors, one about 15 feet away in the ER and another about 60 feet away in the nurses station. The signal was strong in both places despite having to go through brick, masonry, and multiple walls. There were multiple alert sounds which were easy to figure out with instructions given. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C

customer_reviews.title: Fire the electrician and turn down the hearing aid.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the elderly and/or those people that may have slightly impaired hearing such as my in-laws. Most of their family and friends come to their garage entrance that doesn't have a door bell so we placed it there. Mounted one alarm downstairs and the other upstairs so they can hear it throughout the house and they didn't have to pay an electrician to install it! The alarms plug into any outlet so they don't have to mess with batteries either except for the button by the garage. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome doorbell
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect solution for a bi-level home, just plug one in upstairs, one down & since you can adjust the volume levels, you will hear the tones throughout. I love the rich and bold digital clear sound of the standard ding-dong when setting up I just kept having to hear it!!! The outside push button lights up as well as the indoor plug ins ONCE IT IS DEPRESSED, NOT CONTINUOUSLY LIT!!! It is battery powered that is why. But I chose the almond color so it would stand out against white trim so it can be identified by a visitor as a doorbell. Very,Very nice for the price! Totally satisfied, quality product
customer_reviews.author: Katmandude

customer_reviews.title: Nothing could be easier!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with my beautiful new doorbell in fact I ordered one for my daughter as well. It's so easy and quick to install the longest part is picking out the ringtone you want I believe there are 53 of them awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy T.

customer_reviews.title: Works great! My Dad was thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hard of hearing father and it works great! It can be VERY loud and being able to put the speakers in different rooms is awesome. He loved the William Tell Overture ringtone (there are over 50 different ones) so that's what he gets to hear now every time the doorbell rings! I can't believe I didn't buy this for him sooner. He missed a package delivery the week before and was so mad. Now he wont a package ever again! Unless they knock..
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doorbell system, allowing for ringers to be placed in two different places in the house, ensuring that no matter where we are in the house, we will hear if someone rings the doorbell. There are 50 or more styles of rings, from the typical ding, ding-dong, and Westminster chime, to the less standard dog bark and siren sounds. The units themselves are attractive and unobtrusive, and appear to be of high quality. We expect many years of reliable service from this doorbell system. A single ringer is also available if a person doesn't want or need two ringers.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.

customer_reviews.title: East install
customer_reviews.text: The product came packaged well and with all promised pieces. Looks good and worked right away. Thr insyruction sheet is really tiny; I almost needed a magnifier. One small oddity: there is sn included sheet that invites you to become a "premium customer" and get certain goodies by logging into a website -- except the address is not a valid address, and searching for any of the relevant keywords doesn't find anything. Still, this isn't anything I expected when I bought the product so doesn't affect the rating
customer_reviews.author: D. Geller

customer_reviews.title: Registration
customer_reviews.text: The minimal instructions said to register the doorbell to get an instruction manual. Went to their web site. Tried to register. Gave me a choice to select a free device. Only two six devices were shown as available. Registration was rejected as these were actually out of stock. So went back to register not selecting a free device, but would not let me register unless I selected a device, and none were available. Does not inspire confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted...
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell works great, and has a ton of chimes to choose from! We chose the shortest, most basic chime, but it rings like a champ. We have one of the receivers upstairs and one downstairs, so we don't miss anyone at the door regardless of where we may be in the house. The LED feature is nice for when we're playing a movie with the volume up loud, or it would be ideal for those who are hard of hearing. The fact that the receivers plug into an outlet is great - no batteries to fool with there! So far, we're very happy with this doorbell and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bathon

customer_reviews.title: Won't stick so we screwed it to the door frame
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our rustic ski chalet. After falling off twice, my husband screwed it to the door frame. This is a small house, but we can't hear someone knocking. With a receiver on the first floor and a receiver on the third floor, we are set. I have this same doorbell at my home, and it is working perfectly after 5 years. Had to get another receiver when the remodelers lost one, and that paired with no issues. Terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney's Mom

customer_reviews.title: As advertised and works very well
customer_reviews.text: I was considering the "Ring" but due to the reviews and technical difficulty I was very leery. Anyway, when I thought about it, all I wanted was to know when someone was at the front door as I have windows and can easily see. Installation was unbelievably easy. Put in the batteries in the ringer and plug the chimes in the wall. Worked first time everywhere in the house. If all you are looking for is a door bell, this is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Harris D. Levin

customer_reviews.title: Working Perfectly After A Year In The Weather!
customer_reviews.text: I've had bad luck with wireless doorbells not working correctly for more than a few months. This one's still good as new after 11 months. Super easy to install and set up. The volume is good and loud, and my elderly mother can hear the two bells from anywhere in her c.1800 square foot house. If I had one complaint, it'd be that virtually all the different chimes are gimmicky in my opinion. Out of 50+ chimes, only one sounded like a normal, tasteful ring. My mother was adamant she didn't want any tune, or sounding like Big Ben, or anything like that. Other than that, it's been a great product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It lasted just under 5 years before starting to ring on it's own. I tried replacing the battery but still would just randomly ring (with no person at door on separate camera). The receiver inside is bulky and covered both outlets. It served it's purpose, but I expected it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: If you need a doorbell, this is the one to get
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell is great! We did not have a working doorbell and I have been researching what doorbell to buy for days and finally pulled the trigger on this one based on the images, description and of course reviews. It is super easy to install, looks great and professional, and can be heard throughout the house. We have a bigger house so we bought the dual receiver unit and have one of them in the basement. No issues with reception and we now know when someone is at the door wherever we are. Love that the volume can be adjusted and that it hasn’t different ring tones as well. Would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ScottFam

customer_reviews.title: A doorbell that works great and has many features!
customer_reviews.text: So glad to have a doorbell again! Love that the receivers are plug-in and don't require batteries. The selection of melodies and volume control are a great asset. I put one on the main level and one in the lower level. Both work great and I could have different melodies on each if I wanted to. The transmitter works great and lights up for late evening guests. It does require a battery, but that's not a problem as I always have the required battery on hand. I definitely recommend this product! I forgot to mention that I bought the white set but it does come in a variety of colors also.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Update your out of date doorbell with this!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t get any easier than this to add or update an out of date door bell. Nice clean modern look and feel. I was worried it would be an eyesore but it really doesn’t draw any attention to it even with the dark color I went with. The Old bulky door bell up on the wall was way more of an eyesore. Installed in a matter of minutes thanks to YouTube. As for range, we have a 2,400 sq ft rambler. Installed one near front door and other down hallway and no issues with connection.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: This wireless door bell works as described. Very easy to install. Batteries in door bell button are lasting a long time. (My previous wireless door bell went through batteries like toilet paper.) There are many versions of bells from which to select, but not an easy way to select. That is, if you pass the sound you want to use, you will have to "toggle" through the other 59 sounds to return to it. This product has been very reliable...an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Black

customer_reviews.title: Good Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Wireless doorbell works great and like that it comes in a few colors to match your decor. And I especially love the fact that there are over 50 different tones/sounds that you can choose from, even ones line "Happy Birthday" or "We Wish You A Merry Christmas" - lol. I just wish that there was a list of all the tones provided inside the packaging so you can look at them and see which number they are in the list so you don't have to scroll through every single one and hear it to see what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen D.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good value
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell was pretty much what I was looking for. No bells and whistles with it. Not too many different ringtone options, but that was okay with me. I plugged one "ringer" downstairs and one upstairs in an 1800 sq ft house and they both receive the signal with no issues. I haven't had it long enough to know how durable it is. Seems kind light but shouldn't get much abuse, so hopefully we will get a few years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo18

customer_reviews.title: Replaced wired doorbell with a battery doorbell and am completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought based on the favorable reviews and the ease of installation and the two receivers vs one....not to mention the very reasonable price. I had just replaced a wired doorbell with a new one because it was not loud enough and the new one was no louder and I sent it back to replace it with this battery operated type. I am totally satisfied and sold on the battery type. Who cares if you have to pop in a new battery many months down the line. I had the up and running in no time and am satisfied so far with the factory chimes and loud setting.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: This has worked out great. I needed a doorbell that could be heard ...
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out great. I needed a doorbell that could be heard downstairs and also on the third floor where you can't hear the normal doorbell. Very easy to install and no issues with connectivity from the transmitter to either base.
customer_reviews.author: Baton de Colle

customer_reviews.title: Such an easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Such an easy set up! Out of the box and working within 10 mins. Even came with a perfect 3M tape size for the button. I love everything about this system. The only downside is the process for changing the ring noise... You can only scroll through the 50+ noises in one direction, so if you accidentally switch one, you have to press the other until they match noises. God forbid you miss the one your were looking for, you have to listen to 50+ rings before you find it again. Should have a Ringer Up and Ringer Down button to avoid the annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for the distance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this system because I switched to anew alarm system and was no longer able to hear the beautiful chimes I previously attached to my door bell. The new system could not adapt them and I missed a very important visitors because I could hear them in my lower level office. My new doorbell works perfectly. I placed on receiver in my office and the other in my family room with a different song and love the contrast. The quality of the chimes are good, just wish the West Minister Chimes was a few seconds longer but I’m adjusting. I recommend this product for any one who struggles with hearing their door beep on a different level.
customer_reviews.author: "B"

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and it works great, unlike some that I have bought in the past that were pretty junky .It has a wide range of tones you can play on it including even Christmas music. It comes complete with the battery. Just a tip---if you have the regular pushbutton---not the waterproof one----make sure it is installed in a covered area and make sure that the slot on the pushbutton that is used to open it is installed with that slot facing down. That will help to keep any moisture out of it.
customer_reviews.author: John Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good range, easy basic setup
customer_reviews.text: For basic setup, plug it in and it works. Changing the songs takes time as there are a lot to go thru, and if you skip one and you want to go back, you have to go thru them all to get to it. I was looking for one that my mom with hearing issues could hear best, so it took a few loops thru to get it selected. The button is on a metal door and the furthest receiver is 75 feet away and has no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing a wired doorbell that was no longer working and decided to try a wireless. This product has a great design and offers a selection of colors to match your needs. The outdoor transmitter attached easily outside my door. The receivers just plug into any convenient outlet to where you want the chime to be heard. I bought two indoor receivers so was able to cover my entire house which is over 6,700 sq ft. The entire job was done in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Archer

customer_reviews.title: 1 receiver stopped working after 4 months, Button stopped working after 13 months.
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with this order, easy set-up, functional, until 1 of the 2 receivers stopped working after about 4 months. I tried to contact the company but have not gotten a response to have the failed receiver replaced. ... so effectively there is no warranty if you can't get in touch with them. Update: about 13 months after the purchase the push button stopped working. Replaced battery, still won't work. I have a covered porch is Florida. It did not get wet, but was in a humid climate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best doorbell!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a doorbell for my gate since our driveway is a little bit far from my house. If someone is outside my gate, we wouldn't hear them unless my dogs bark. I wanted a wireless doorbell to avoid the hassle of installing wired one. This didn't disappoint. I know it says waterproof and for outdoor use but we still install it with a covering to protect it from rain and harsh sunlight. So far so good. We haven't change the battery of the transmitter since we installed it. I like how we can move around the receiver as long as there is power outlet. Worth the price. Hassle-free installation.
customer_reviews.author: Jeng

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. We have a rather weak doorbell ringer that cannot be heard throughout the house, especially if the A/C unit is running. With these door bell receivers, mounted in separate locations, we have no problem hearing the doorbell. Perfect solution to our old deaf ears.
customer_reviews.author: Slappy

customer_reviews.title: Great Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I love this doorbell!! It was very easy to install and works fantastic! I got the door bell transmitter and two receivers. I put it outside on our brick wall by the front door and it has stuck well on the brick. Having 2 receivers, it can easily be heard throughout my 2000 sq ft home. I really like the many chimes available to choose from. I would buy this set again. For a home that is not wired for a doorbell, this works just as well as if it had.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: To Chime or Not to Chime
customer_reviews.text: This product was received with the transmitter in three pieces. However, after reassembling the transmitter it did work and the color selection makes it very attractive. Changing the chime is another issue. I've read the directions and was able to cycle through all the chimes, but no matter which chime is selected, the chime always reverts back to the default chime. Maybe there's more to setting the chime than is indicated in the directions. UPDATE: After watching a video on YouTube I realized I wasn't pressing the doorbell quick enough to select the desired tone. The doorbell works fine now.
customer_reviews.author: LarryL

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: One of the receiver units instantly had issues from the get go and would only work about half the time. Over time it's completely given out and now only one works. The choice of rings is nice but is a pain to scroll through as is the volume control. Also, for a door bell it really isn't designed well for the outdoors. There are a lot of openings were water can get in and inside is just an exposed circuit board and battery. I already had it short once due to heavy rains. Overall, good for the money but I'll likely have to replace it eventually for something a bit more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: HiHi

customer_reviews.title: SadoTech Wireless Dorrbell - 1 Transmitter and 2 Receivers
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly through Amazon Prime. The Transmitter and the Receivers are stylish and attractive. The installation of the Transmitter took less than 3 minutes. I used the included adhesive template and attached it to our wooden door frame. Placed one of the plugin receivers in our Park Model living room and the second plugin receiver was placed near our bedroom. Wife just loves all the available music/chimes ring tones.
customer_reviews.author: Azph

customer_reviews.title: It's a doorbell.
customer_reviews.text: My 20yr old doorbell's wiring was dying so, replacement time. I was having other work done in my home so I had them install this. It took the guy not even 5 minutes to screw to outside frame. Because I didn't read the instructions first, I didn't check the ringtones, so I'm using the basic doorbell tone. One receiver is on the main floor and the other is in the basement. My bedroom is on the 3rd floor and I can hear it very easily.
customer_reviews.author: J. Banks

customer_reviews.title: loud
customer_reviews.text: Never had door bell in my life. my son bought it it is fun /super loud .my door is one of those you open w key both sides so sometimes when key is inside you cannot open from outside .Before was a mess kids didnt pick the phone have to enter through window ....lol ...Now just ring the bell everyone is downstairs in a minute...opening the door. visitors are notice right away before they just yell like old times ..very happy baby boomer
customer_reviews.author: hacordbird 20

customer_reviews.title: Great system all around!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install, works perfectly in my long, rather narrow loft apartment. I bought two receivers and plugged one in the front and one at the back so never miss a ding-dong. The variety of sounds is not relevant to me, but if you have kiddies it would provide them with fun seasonal changes. Hey...I’ll never miss an Amazon delivery again!
customer_reviews.author: NJJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent doorbell replacement.
customer_reviews.text: They work as great. We use them inside so I can't comment on weatherproof. The only downsides I could think of. 1. For a house you will probably want more than 1 so you can hear them upstairs and down without having to turn the volume up high. 2. Each one permanently consumes a plug and are large enough that trying to plug in something else that is oversized into the same outlet may be troublesome.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds all expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other wireless doorbell products with limited success. This one blows the others away. Excellent range, even through steel reinforced concrete block construction, and a long distance between the front door and the lanai where the second receiver is. Others required repeaters to do this, and frequently they didn't work. Adjustable volume with more than adequate loudness. Attractive also and easy to install--about five minutes. Very affordably priced; cheaper than the junk I had before. The rave reviews I read about this product are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: GrillMaster

customer_reviews.title: Dead ringer ... high ratings?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! Just received product and one of the two chimes is DEAD. Ugh. Tried everything and a nothing. Was hoping to send seller a note to resolve but don’t see that option. Anyone else have this issue? So disappointed with such a high rating. Will need to return. Update: I just have NO IDEA how this product gets such high ratings. NO IDEA. Finally replacement after dead ringer, and chime selection process fails. No idea how such good ratings. Was hoping to trust reviews. Ugh x 2.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent range, sound quality, and ease of operation
customer_reviews.text: I never thought that I would venture into the world of wireless doorbells. This was primarily because of the sounds that I had heard from others. Sado Tech's chime quality is sufficient to please a couple of veteran musicians. There are plenty of sampled conventional doorbells (in addition to songs that range from cute to cheesy) to choose from, and the volume control is excellent. Installation is a no-brainer which sweetened the deal.
customer_reviews.author: Merbert

customer_reviews.title: Great for Grandparent Who Struggled to Hear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two years ago for my grandparents who are hard of hearing. This has been a game changer! Pros: - Plug and play (or should I say Plug and Ring?) - Plug into outlets around your house and install the button next to your door outside. - Volume can be adjusted at all different levels. My grandparents can finally hear us when we ring the door bell! - Various ring tones make it fun as well Cons: - We haven't had many! It does exactly what we wanted it do and haven't messed with it in two years! It just works!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Lots of sound options, the quality of sound isn't top notch but it's adequate.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this doorbell for just over a month. So many musical and doorbell sound options. From happy birthday to Merry Christmas. It is a quite a bit tinny sounding. The sound quality is definitely nothing like our original doorbell, unfortunately. What I like most, we can put a doorbell upstairs, and a second one downstairs. Now we can hear the doorbell no matter where we are in the house. We like that. And we can move the doorbell around as needed. If we are working outside, we can take it outside and plug it in on an exterior plug-in if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Midwestgal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I initially had issues with my recent purchase of this product so I emailed Sado Tech directly. The technician, Gabriela who assisted me with my issues was very professional and gave me some possible solutions as the transmitter was not working properly. After a few attempts in doing what she instructed me, she determined that the entire unit should be replaced. I received my replacement a few days ago and once I exchanged the entire unit, it is now working properly. I do like the unit (although I'm thinking in the future of upgrading and getting a wireless one with a camera), however I really appreciate the customer service I received from Gabriela!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy V.

customer_reviews.title: FAILED AFTER 1.5 YEARS
customer_reviews.text: It worked for awhile and then stopped. I replaced the battery and then it worked and now it doesn't. If I press the button several times it will sometimes ring. So I need to get something else. Also, the cover is very hard to reinstall - I would like to see a video of someone putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: Zelyntor

customer_reviews.title: Works Great Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Like the headline says It works Great and was super easy to install. I needed an additional doorbell inside my garage and on the sunroom. Recommended to anyone that needs a doorbell or an additional doorbell. The only thing that might be a negative is it doesn't tell you how to select the ringtone you want. It is on the piece that plugs into the electric outlet. I accidentally found it when I was moving the bell to a different plug in and touched it when I was plugging it in.
customer_reviews.author: LadyInKY

customer_reviews.title: Great doorbell!
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to install! It took me no more than 5 minutes to get everything installed and working. I had a problem getting the receivers to consistently pick up the transmitters signals at first, but I have fixed and now they ring every time! This was perfect for my home, which had no doorbell at all. Now my guests have a doorbell to ring rather than having to wait outside and call me!
customer_reviews.author: N. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: They work straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This bell is absolutely idiot-proof! I bought mine a few months ago and had it up and running in 30 minutes. Pretty good for an 88 year old who is technically challenged. A friend was so impressed I ordered one for them, and they love it. I particularly like it because it's loud enough to wake the dead, which is great when I'm on the back porch or in the garage. Works great for this old lady.....thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Hummer Lover

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, works great
customer_reviews.text: Our hard wired doorbell was a casualty of a 1st floor renovation we did. The contractors inadvertently cut the wire to the chime and that wire is buried behind some custom cabinetry. Rather than hassle with trying to fish a new wire from the front door to the 2nd floor where the chime is located, we bought this Sado Tech wireless door bell. Installation is extremely easy. What takes the longest is clicking through the various chime tones trying to figure out which one we liked best. Otherwise, you are looking at 5 minute installation at most. We like that there are seasonal chimes, like for Christmas, which makes it fun for our young grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: FSH

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my "hard of hearing" mother-in-law for her apartment. She LOVES it. So easy to set up, and since it comes with two two plug in receivers I have one in her living area and one in her bedroom. Truly reliable. I tried a few other brands with zero luck but this one has been well worth the money. It has lots of different tunes, tones and volume controls to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: K.K.

customer_reviews.title: The doorbell came with 2 receivers. Only one worked ...
customer_reviews.text: The doorbell came with 2 receivers. Only one worked. The support team responded, and suggested that I press the two buttons on the side, and then ring the bell within 5 seconds. That is not possible, given that there are no plugs within 5 seconds of the door. It takes more than 5 seconds to get from where it is plugged in, to the doorbell. Also, they gave me 72 hours to try that, but did not tell me that I had only 72 hours. When the bell stops working, I will most definitely try another brand! Also, the link to a video did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C

customer_reviews.title: I can hear it now!
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to have my doorbell ring wherever I m in my house. Simply moved my two ringers to wallplugs in two areas of the house where I spend most of my time. I can always hear it ring now. Lots of ring tones to choose from. Ended up attaching it to the brick on my porch with sticky tape included. Will probably figure out a more permanent way to attach it.
customer_reviews.author: Ethereal

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions in package and none on website.
customer_reviews.text: Bell works fine. Instructions that came with the bell were brief and inaccurate. The webpage doesn't provide any information, just marketing, until you register product. The registration function on the webpage did not work, just kept telling me that I was not eligible for a free product. I finally found an answer by going using a link in Amazon to a YouTube video. Product specifications on Amazon were misleading. Only a special unit is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Paul

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to set up but there are too many tone choices that I am not at all interested in and wish they could be deleted or changed and would like to have more than four levels of volume and the lowest is useless. Otherwise it works great and no problem for the second receiver up in our upstairs TV room. The design is nice and the receivers are the perfect size. Overall I would of given it a 5 star rating if it weren't for the volume levels and not being able to load different or delete tone choices.
customer_reviews.author: FAS

customer_reviews.title: No more missed visitors!
customer_reviews.text: Love the device. Weathers well, works well and easy to install. Have an enclosed gated patio that was built after home and that ommited my 1st doorbell from guest. The Sado Tech allows me to keep visitors at a distance, but gives them an option to notify me inside. My Mother ordered one as well. She works in her backyard alot and placed the ringer on her porch because she was frequently missing visitors. Quality product, fairly priced.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Company - Great Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this over a year ago and it has performed perfectly. I love the way you can adjust the volume and change the sound for each receiver separately. Recently I was power washing my house and somehow got water in the transmitter. Not a good idea. I contacted the company and explained my situation. I wanted to purchase another transmitter. Not only were they sympathetic to my plight, they sent me a complete new set absolutely free. I did have to pay a small amount for shipping but regardless they are a wonderful company to work with. If you need a wireless doorbell, this is the one..
customer_reviews.author: Paulies46

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and is capable of very loud volume, if you desire. The installation consists of just plugging the device in and putting batteries in the button. Operator functions work well. The only thing that would be nice to have would be to directly access the chime tones. Now you have to access them serially and if you miss the tone you want, you have to go all the way around again. In general, it's hard to beat for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Brewmaster

customer_reviews.title: Works across our farm!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a solution for our farm to know when someone ringing the doorbell at the house, some 100 feet from out workshop. I was hopeful that this Saco Tech doorbell was the answer. It has met and exceeded my expectations! I can now be in my shop working, and when Amazon rings the bell at the house for a delivery, I can hear it!! Works great!! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: S.B. Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Works well and rings loud like I need it to
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I moved back home and I order a lot of packages. The front door is solid and I cant hear baby taps on the door. So to avoid missing the delivery man and having my packages left outside to get potentially stolen, I bought this doorbell. I love the multiple ring tones and volume settings. I can hear it in every room and its been working without incident thus far
customer_reviews.author: ms. divalicious

customer_reviews.title: 😢
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this product! I order the doorbell with two speakers. The first one I ordered the actual doorbell button was defective and didn’t work through the speakers. The speakers worked but good are they without a working button. I returned it and received my replacement. This one has only one speaker that functions! I’m keeping it for now because I need it for work immediately and I just don’t have time to mess with returning it yet again. I don’t think I’d purchase another product of this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Reese Teach

customer_reviews.title: Easy To setup & Install!
customer_reviews.text: A very good Doorbell system and so Easy to setup and install. We have tried 3 other wireless doorbell systems rated at 150ft range. They all ended up quitting outright or the Transmit button became intermittent. This one is made much better and has a higher strength antenna. Works great right out of the box. The volume adjustment is very good to have but Most of the 50+ ring options do not sound that good. Still worth getting because of the Price, Range and overall quality. Fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The good: This is super easy to use. Buttons on the side to adjust volume. Sticky back for the button, and a plug on the indoor speaker parts. The bad: one of the speakers glitches and sometimes rings over and over. I have to jiggle it and hit the volume button and wait a few seconds for it to stop. So I can't rely on that one for a doorbell. But the other one works great.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking door bell
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install, but I have problems matching the two receivers. The one close to the front door is nice and loud and the one in the kitchen (about 70 feet apart) is very hard to hear. I'll have my son look at it when he comes for a visit. I am not to "swift" when it comes to technical things. Must read the instructions, maybe he will understand them??
customer_reviews.author: Inge B

customer_reviews.title: So easy, works great...love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ive never had a doorbell in 24 years and dont have the electrics near a door in my old house so this remote feature attracted me...so nice to have, so easy to install...4 volume levels, I'm moderately hearing impaired and at its loudest I can hear it without aids in my ears, lots of different chimes...just couple screws into vinyl, remove the battery protective tape, plug in the 2 receivers into an outlet of your choice (works upside down in my electrical outlets as well) and press one of 2 buttons on the receiver for volume level and preferred chime...works like a charm!!! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bodyreflexion

customer_reviews.title: Ding Dong!!!
customer_reviews.text: For the last couple of years I've had to deal with a door bell that does not work. Not much you can do when a 75 year old doorbell finally calls it quits. Instead of ripping out wires and whatnot, picked up this little beauty and could not be happier. It comes with 2 different ways to attach: double sided adhesive which seems to be working quite well. I've stuck it to the mailbox attached by the front door. The other way is via screws. Was very easy to set up and install. I think it took 5 mins. Awesome buy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and very helpful to have two bells
customer_reviews.text: I have limited mobility and a long house, so I can't hear a doorbell that's just in one end of the house. This allows me to have two different receivers so I know when it's ringing. My understanding is that I could also have two buttons -- and it would ring differently for the button at the ground floor than the button at the front door. Anxious to try this out.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce-Kay Ruckelshaus

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have an L-shaped ranch-style home and as other reviewers have pointed out, it can be difficult to hear a doorbell from one side of the house when the door is on the other. This product solved that problem for us. We placed one receiver in the hallway by the door and the other receiver at the "bend" of our home. Now, the doorbell is clearly audible everywhere in the home. The light up feature on the button and receivers is a nice touch. Overall design is modern and looks nice plugged in. Highly recommend if you do not have a wired doorbell. Can't beat the price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark
